# GCDirectionalGamepad

**Class**

A profile that supports only the directional pad, without motion or rotation.

## Declaration

```swift
class GCDirectionalGamepad
```

## Overview

The directional gamepad profile is similar to a micro gamepad profile except it doesn’t support motion or rotation. The controller’s [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCController/motion] property is `nil` and the inherited [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCMicroGamepad/allowsRotation] property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

If you select Micro Gamepad when you add the Game Controllers capability ([doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/GCSupportedGameControllers] ) to your project, and you also support the GCDirectionalGamepad profile, select Directional Gamepad as well.

If you support the second-generation Siri Remote and later, set the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/BundleResources/Information-Property-List/GCSupportsMultipleMicroGamepads] key to `YES` in the information property list in your project.

In addition, the directional pad element may report digital or analog values. If the directional pad’s [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCControllerElement/isAnalog] property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false], it reports absolute directional pad values (the [doc://com.apple.gamecontroller/documentation/GameController/GCMicroGamepad/reportsAbsoluteDpadValues] property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true]).

## Accessing Elements by Name

## Accessing controller profiles

- **extendedGamepad**: The extended gamepad profile.
- **GCPhysicalInputProfile**: The base class for controller profiles that support physical buttons, thumbsticks, and directional pads.
- **GCKeyboardInput**: A controller profile that uses the keyboard as the input device.
- **GCMouseInput**: A controller profile that tracks input from a mouse.
- **GCExtendedGamepad**: A controller profile that supports the extended set of gamepad controls.
- **GCDualShockGamepad**: A controller profile that supports the DualShock 4 controller.
- **GCXboxGamepad**: A controller profile that supports the Xbox controller.
- **GCDualSenseGamepad**: A controller profile that supported the DualSense controller.
- **microGamepad**: The micro gamepad profile.
- **GCMicroGamepad**: A controller profile that supports the Siri Remote.
- **motion**: The motion input profile.
- **physicalInputProfile**: The physical input profile for the controller.
- **gamepad**: The gamepad profile.
